body.description: Tramontina's PRO Series 10 in Fry Pan is designed and manufactured to withstand the rigors of a professional kitchen, and easily adapt to personal use every day. Reach for this one to fry, scramble, sauté, and sear your favorite recipes for one, and trust your dishes will be cooked to perfection. The fry pan's commercial-grade, heavy-gauge aluminum construction distributes heat quickly and evenly, while the reinforced nonstick interior allows food to easily release from the pan providing effortless cooking and cleanup. The cast stainless steel handle is riveted for added support and features a removable, silicone, soft-grip for versatility and maneuverability. This cookware is NSF certified, compatible with gas, electric and ceramic glass cooktops, can be used in the oven up to 400°F / 204°C.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PRO Series Fry Pans Ideal for frying, scrambling, sautéing, and searing your favorite recipes. MADE IN BRAZIL

Tramontina PRO Series Fry Pans Tramontina's PRO Series Restaurant Fry Pans are designed and manufactured to withstand the rigors of a professional kitchen, and easily adapt to home and non-commercial use. Ideal for frying, scrambling, sautéing, and searing your favorite recipes, the fry pans' commercial-grade, heavy-gauge aluminum construction distributes heat quickly and evenly, while the reinforced nonstick interior allows food to easily release from the pan for effortless cooking and cleanup. The cast stainless steel handle is riveted for added support and features a versatile removable, silicone, soft-grip. This cookware is NSF certified, compatible with gas, electric and ceramic glass cooktops, can be used in the oven up to 400 F / 204 C. This cookware is part of the Tramontina Professional collection–designed and crafted to optimize performance in both restaurant and gourmet kitchens. Design, material, finishes and fixtures are carefully selected to match the expectations of professional chefs.

Easy-release Reinforced Nonstick Cooking Surface PFOA-Free high-performance nonstick allows food to easily release from the pan – providing effortless cooking and cleanup. Cast Stainless Steel Handle with Removable Silicone Grip Riveted handle provides added support and removable, silicone grip is versatile for using in and out of the oven. Three Solid Rivets Cast stainless steel handle is secured with three solid rivets for added support. NSF Certified Made of heavy-gauge aluminum and certified per the same rigorous standards used for cookware found in professional kitchens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sturdy weight, nice finish, fried egg doesn't stick, and cleans fast easy
reviews.reviewText: This met my expectations per reviews.Nice non stick finish, good weighted bottom, nice oven proof handle.Good price, good value. Im careful not to run under water before it's cooled, like directions tell you, cause bottom may not stay flat if you do that to any pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for $$
reviews.reviewText: We bought the 12 inch and liked it enough to then buy this 10 inch. I can't speak to longevity, but they are sturdy, cook well, and The handle grip doesn't overheat. I find them to be excellent value at this price point. And i have looked at a lot of pans before buying these. I did buy a 12 inch Blue Diamond from walmart at the same price a few months ago, and these blow that one away by far. The walmart pan was what i expected at this price: serviceable but just ok with a non stick coating that's not very non stick (it requires scrubbing with a gentle faux-metal scrubber to get stuck food off). These are a big step up from that Blue Diamond. These are truly non stick and durable (at least in the short term, which is so far all i can speak to).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a beautiful frying pan!
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this pan. It is heavy duty and sturdy. Very easy to clean. So far, nothing sticks to it. Eggs are perfectly done. I think it is by new go-to pan. Seriously folks, it is wonderful. I hope it lasts for years, but at that price, I got two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good everyday skillet so far
reviews.reviewText: As others have noted the handle is a bit long, just use safety measures and keep the handle turned inward to prevent clothes etc from catching the skillet. Cooks well and the nonstick surface is truly nonstick so far and I like the weight of it compared to many that are very light. I find most nonstick wears out over time making a big $$ investment a waste. This one was a reasonable price and if you follow instructions by not using nonstick spray or overheating it should last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well at a good price
reviews.reviewText: I don't think it is every worth it to spend $100+ on the more sought after brands of non-stick pans. The coating is always going to have a limited life.This pan has good weight, heats evenly, and is a good size at a good price point. The handle is a little long - that does not bother me much and the rubber cover helps keep it cool. The bottom scratches easily on my stove top but I don't need the outside of the pan to look pristine, I need it to work well. Holding up better than similarly priced pans from big box stores over the first few months of nearly daily use for me. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fry fry fry
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent non stick pa. For the money. Well balanced, aluminum so it conducts heat well. Look, no nonstick pan lasts forever. Don’t waste money on high priced brands. This is a quality pan that you will get 8-12 months of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new nonstick pan and bought this one on recommendation from Wirecutter. Been using it a couple times per week for a few months and an very happy with the cooking performance, nonstick performance, eat to clean, and surface shows no damage. Feels like it will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Massive, avoid bamboo/wood spatulas.
reviews.reviewText: Our front gas burners are massive so we can take advantage of these bigger pans, which is great for doing meal prep type meals. Most stoves probably can't take a 14inch pan and effectively cook in it though. Obviously you are out of luck if you need a lid for this thing.I've used lots of Tramontina pans over the years and love them, much better quality and price than anything else.The coating holds up great, but do not use bamboo or wood spatulas. I don't know what it is, but it will mar up the surface (as some pictures here show). It still functions fine, it's not really scratched, it just looks marred. If you use normal non-stick plastic spatulas and silicone ones the pan will last longer than any other pan.
Buena distribución de calor y rápida cocción. Muy buen antiadherente.

I usually get t-fal pans but I like this one a lot better, for approximately the same price. It is heavy and the higher edges make it easy to flip food. I couldn't do that in the t-fal pans. Easy to clean as well; food doesn't stick but I don't cook food higher than medium heat, as suggested.
Ya he comprado estos sartenes TRAMONTINA varias veces, son de muy buena calidad y duran mucho. Sobra decir que se cocina muy bien con ellos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent pan but it was certainly not worth waiting 6 weeks for it to arrive. It was beautifully packaged and cooks well.
The non-stick coating is second to none! This is the best non-stick pan I've ever used.
